tool_description: Provide aggregated Data of football matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
name: Football Aggregated Data
title: Football Aggregated Data

api_list.name: Get Matches In-Play
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-aggregated-data.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/matches-in-play"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-aggregated-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
